titleStmt.title: The scotch lasses choice, or, Jennys love for Jockey's kindnes: an excellent new song, much in request. To a pleasant new scotch tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon, at the Angel in Guiltspur-street, without Newgate.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "Long cold nights, when winter frozen ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in Guiltspur-street, without Newgate.
